author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Sri Lankan Navy, on Sunday, arrested two fishermen and seized from them, 6.5 kg of ganja being smuggled into Sri Lanka.

The fishermen, C. Jagadeesh (26) of Keechankuppam and R. Kalaimani (27) of Akkaraipettai near here, ventured into sea by a country boat from Nagapattinam on Saturday morning, official sources said. They were arrested at Point Pedro at abour 4 a.m.Navy personnel intercepted the fishermen at Point Pedro at about 4 a.m. on Sunday.
title: 2 fishermen held by Sri Lankan Navy for smuggling ganja
